headline: Nvidia CEO Huang said SaaSpocalypse narrative wrong, sees ’deep misunderstanding’
summary: Investing.com - Over the last month or so, markets have been gripped by a grim narrative: the “SaaSpocalypse.” As agentic AI surged, investors fled traditional software names like Salesforce, ServiceNow, SAP, Cadence, Synopsys, and even legacy giants like IBM, on fears AI agents would replace the need for software altogether. In a wide-ranging interview with CNBC’s Rebecca Quick, Nvidia (NASDAQ:NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang called that thesis not just premature, but fundamentally wrong. His core argume

headline: Jim Cramer Highlights the Strength of Cadence Design
summary: Cadence Design Systems, Inc. (NASDAQ:CDNS) is one of the stocks that was on Jim Cramer’s radar recently. Cramer discussed the stock during the episode and said: So where do I come out on this? Look, I think you need to take the competitive threat from AI very seriously, and when we’re talking about traditional enterprise […]

headline: Rosenblatt Maintains Buy on Cadence Design Systems, Maintains $360 Price Target
summary: Rosenblatt  analyst Blair Abernethy   maintains Cadence Design Systems (NASDAQ:CDNS) with a Buy and maintains $360 price target.
